Arrow came back with some weird stuff. Stronghold groaned but then his stom=
ach growled.

"Okay, what is that?" Stronghold said. Blender laughed and gr=
abbed some of the...whatever.

"Well, I found some assorted stuff and mixed=
 it together. Berry's, mushrooms, some squirrels." Arroe said. Blender shru=
gged and kept eating it.

"Ahhh, yeah, thanks." Stranato said.
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:12 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infect=
ra sits down on the ground* Infectra: I hope so too. *Infectra says back to=
 Airbomber and than sighs*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THEC=
ODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:03 AM
  =
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


    Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Megatron'=
s) base and looks at it. It didn't notice her, so she went closer and inspe=
cted it. She looked around it, making notes of certain things.

    Plintis=
sa followed Artist out in the missle of no where in a desert. Artist turned=
 around and looked at Plintissa.

    "Plintissa now see Artist's secret tr=
easure!" Artist said. He smiled. Plintissa was stunned. Artist dug a little=
 in the sand, and brought up a hermit crab shell. Artist laughed and ran of=
f laughing giddily. Plintissa sighed and turned back. No wait, maybe this w=
ay was back. No wait, that way. Plintissa realized she was lost, and that A=
rtist was nowhere to be found. She looked around from left to right. Oh, wh=
at was the use, she might as well be dead out on the desert anyhow, she obv=
iously wasn't needed, not even Dracona stuck around with her! She had thoug=
ht that Iron Raptor was her friend, but that blew up in her face. Then she =
made the mistake of trusting some bot sho said he would help her, and then =
she went off and nobody trusted her any longer. Plintissa walked off into t=
he distance, hoping to find her way home. Then it occured to her. She didn'=
t have a home. a single tear fell from Plintissa's eye and she walked on.

=
    Artist ran off into the distance and looked back joyfully. Plintissa wa=
sn't there.

    "Yikes! I was supposed to protect her!" Artist said. He ra=
n back into the desert, darting quickly mile for mile, trying to find Plint=
issa.

    Gangon's spark glowed eerily and bumped into BrightBlade's hand.=


    Sinesis and Sinister lay there, half dead with Sinister in pieces.

 =
   Deemos figures out that this disgusting team must not be right for him a=
nd he runs off, hoping maybe the Maximals would be good enough to let him a=
nd his wife join and heal up. He ran along, going quickly, about 2 hours la=
ter he found the Maximal base. Inzola was in his arms in stasis lock and sp=
itting out blood, she was bleeding internally. Deemos whimpered and aproach=
ed the Maximal base.

    "Attention! Maximals! I wish to join you, as does=
 my wife and cohort, Inzola! Let me it, Inzola is in critical condition!" D=
eemos said.

    The Radicons ceased their walk and sat down in a forest. A=
irbomber sighed.

    "Food would be good about now." Train Wreck said. Arr=
ow smiled.

    "Wait here, I'll go get something!" Arrow said. He went run=
ning off. Blender and Stronghold shrugged, Stronghold staring into the dist=
ance and Blender scanning the area. Stranato and Train Wreck look at each o=
ther and gulp. Arrow must be their chef now.

    "I hope you like what Arr=
ow makes." Airbomber said to Infectra. (If she's there.)
